UBC Integrated Engineers

Facilities




IGEN Facilities


The IGEN Clubroom and adjacent rooms have a lot to offer. Complete with a fully stocked work shop, computer lab, and electrical lab/workshop that all IGEN student have access to, the Clubroom also includes 47 lockers that are rented out every year. These lockers can be rented out through the VP Internal at the beginning of September for either a full year or just a semester. Any lockers that are available for the second semester are posted on January to be rented out.



Contact person

Hailey Grotkowski

VP Internal

haileygrotkowski@yahoo.ca

780 552 6354



Term 1 locker availability

0 lockers available

Term 2 locker availability

5 lockers available
